episodes.title: Marcus Wesson: The Vampire Cult Leader Who Orchestrated a Family Tragedy
episodes.description: What happens when one man's twisted beliefs lead to a house of horrors? In this chilling episode of Spouse-icidal Tendencies, Darrell and Valery uncover the disturbing case of Marcus Wesson — a self-proclaimed prophet in Fresno, California, who built a secretive cult centered on polygamy, incest, and vampire-based theology. We explore Wesson's early life, his manipulation of family members, and how his terrifying control spiraled into one of the most shocking family tragedies in true crime history. From the hidden abuse and psychological control to the murder-suicide pact and the failed interventions, this episode exposes the dark heart of a man whose delusions cost lives. Featuring: cult dynamics, religious fanaticism, psychological abuse, legal proceedings, and the tragic consequences of unchecked control. Support the show
